citric acid

FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of hydrogen peroxide (HP; CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), percitric acid (CAS Reg. No. 127542-88-5), perlactic acid (CAS Reg. No. 75033-25-9), citric acid (CAS Reg. No. 77-92-9), and lactic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-33-4), manufactured and characterized as further described in the notification.
